languages.text: "Не буду я за Саргону пить — ублюдком он был, своих грабил и ксеносам на мясо продавал".
"I'm not raising a toast to Sargona — he was a scumbag, robbing his own and selling them to the xenos as meat."
languages.original_text: "Не буду я за Саргону пить — ублюдком он был, своих грабил и ксеносам на мясо продавал".

traits.locale_text: "I'm not raising a toast to Sargona — he was a scumbag, robbing his own and selling them to the xenos for meat."
"I'm not raising a toast to Sargona — he was a scumbag, robbing his own and selling them to the xenos for meat."
"I'm not raising a toast to Sargona — he was a scumbag, robbing his own and selling them to the xenos for meat."
"I'm not raising a toast to Sargona — he was a scumbag, robbing his own and selling them to the xenos as meat."
"I'm not raising a toast to Sargona — he was a scumbag, robbing his own and selling them to the xenos as meat."

languages.text: 「サルゴナに乾杯なんてしない、あいつはクズだった。仲間を襲って異種族にその肉を売り飛ばしていたんだ」
languages.original_text: "I'm not raising a toast to Sargona — he was a scumbag, robbing his own and selling them to the xenos as meat."

traits.locale_text: 「サルゴナに乾杯なんてしない、あいつはクズだった。仲間を襲って異種族にその肉を売り飛ばしていたんだ」
「サルゴナに乾杯なんてしない、あいつはクズだった。仲間を襲って異種族にその肉を売り飛ばしていたんだ」

languages.text: "Ich trinke nicht auf Sargona – er war ein Dreckskerl, der die Seinen ausgeraubt und als Fleisch an die Xenos verkauft hat."
languages.original_text: "I'm not raising a toast to Sargona — he was a scumbag, robbing his own and selling them to the xenos as meat."

traits.locale_text: "Ich trinke nicht auf Sargona – er war ein Dreckskerl, der die Seinen ausgeraubt und als Fleisch an die Xenos verkauft hat."

languages.text: "Ben Sargona'ya kadeh kaldırmam. Kendi halkını soyup zenolara et diye satan bir pislikti."
languages.original_text: "I'm not raising a toast to Sargona — he was a scumbag, robbing his own and selling them to the xenos as meat."

traits.locale_text: "Ben Sargona'ya kadeh kaldırmam. Kendi halkını soyup zenolara et diye satan bir pislikti."
"Ben Sargona'ya kadeh kaldırmam. Kendi halkını soyup zenolara et diye satan bir pislikti."

languages.text: «No voy a brindar por Sargona. Era escoria. Robaba a los suyos y los vendía a los xenos como carne».
languages.original_text: "I'm not raising a toast to Sargona — he was a scumbag, robbing his own and selling them to the xenos as meat."

traits.locale_text: «No voy a brindar por Sargona. Era escoria. Robaba a los suyos y los vendía a los xenos como carne».

languages.text: “我可不打算为萨戈纳干杯。他是个狗杂种，抢我们自己人，还把我们的人卖给异形当活畜。”
languages.original_text: "I'm not raising a toast to Sargona — he was a scumbag, robbing his own and selling them to the xenos as meat."

traits.locale_text: “我可不打算为萨戈纳干杯。他是个狗杂种，抢我们自己人，还把我们的人卖给异形当活畜。”
“我可不打算为萨戈纳干杯。他是个狗杂种，抢我们自己人，还把我们的人卖给异形当活畜。”

languages.text: « Je refuse de trinquer pour Sargona. C'était une ordure, capable de voler les siens et de les vendre aux xénos. »
languages.original_text: "I'm not raising a toast to Sargona — he was a scumbag, robbing his own and selling them to the xenos as meat."

traits.locale_text: « Je refuse de trinquer pour Sargona. C'était une ordure, capable de voler les siens et de les vendre aux xénos. »
